timeline.message: DRAFT Add support for bs local

timeline.author: valfirst
valfirst

timeline.bodyText: Why is Selenium configurer bind to tunnelling? What about usual Selenium Grid based on Docker? it doesn't support tunnelling
timeline.author: valfirst

timeline.bodyText: is it required? isn't localIdentifier  enough?
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: yes, both local and localId are required
replies.author: uarlouski

timeline.author: valfirst
valfirst

+package org.vividus.selenium.browserstack;
+
+public class BrowserStackLocalException extends RuntimeException

replies.bodyText: why not? anyway we should fail fast if something wrong happened with BS
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: it would be better to have a single checked exception for both SL and BS, like: TunnelStartException
replies.author: valfirst

timeline.author: valfirst

timeline.bodyText: why is it outside synchronized block?
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: each thread with different options has its own Local instance, if options are the same, other threads will not reach this point
replies.author: uarlouski
valfirst

timeline.author: valfirst
valfirst
valfirst

timeline.bodyText: why not to wait for start ending here?
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: it will not prevent other threads from using this connection
replies.author: uarlouski

replies.bodyText: but still this connection won't be operable, and extra resources will be required to synchronize start completion
replies.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: start method already contains wait logic within it, for starting thread this connection will be always operable
replies.author: uarlouski
